item.title: Openshift - LDAP Auth
item.description: I’m posting my experience with configuring LDAP and Active Directory Authentication since it took to me a few hours to understand how it works on Openshift / OKD and how I may debug it. First things first, it’s best to use a Standalone Master or even Minishift to do all the steps and get to a working config you may use in your HA Cluster. Having it said, let’s get hands dirty.
